TITLE: Episode 41 - Red Pill of the Week: Judgement Day
DESCRIPTION: In our final installment of the Waco Massacre Red Pill of the Week, we conclude the story of the federal government's assault on the Branch Davidians at Mt. Carmel. David Koresh, Mt. Carmel, and all of the people inside were gassed and burned to death. Here's how it happened.
